title: Teriyaki Grill
typeOfFood: Japanese, Fast food, Take-out, Asian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers a healthier alternative to fast food. Tofu can be used in any dish, including salads, whole grains. Family friendly atmosphere. Rice bowls with a choice of white or brown rice or noodles, cooked vegetables and teriyaki sauce. Willing to customize any dish to your tastes (extra veggies, more rice).
